issue.title: [CF 808] Condition lua error
issue.body:
2x TellMeWhen: <string>:"Condition_TRACKING":3: unexpected symbol near "["
Components\Core\Conditions\ConditionObject.lua:70: in function <Components\Core\Conditions\ConditionObject.lua:46>
(tail call): ?
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[3]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[3]":5
(tail call): ?

Core\Conditions\ConditionObjectConstructor.lua:94: in function "Construct"

(tail call): ?
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[1]":5
(tail call): ?

(tail call): ?

<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[4]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[4]":5
(tail call): ?

TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r804.lua:2417: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2365>

nil


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #808 | Raw

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Join us again next week for another edition of "How the hell did that happen?" (this segment will also be featured in a special 2-hour episode of "How did this go unnoticed for nearly 100 revisions?").

In the mean time, this has been fixed in r805 and r806

Edited May 5, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
